title: Villager Backstory Configuration
description: Data-driven villager backstories with biome/profession context for immersive dialogue and quests.

templates.text: Grew up tending the endless wheat fields of {location}. My family has farmed these lands since the Great Replanting.
Lost my brother to pillager raids three harvests ago. Now I trade only with those who prove trustworthy.
The ancient oaks taught me their secrets. They sing of forgotten paths and hidden glades.
Banished from the deep woods for cutting a sacred tree. Now I wander, seeking redemption.
Found emeralds in caves no dwarf would dare enter. The mountain spirits watch over my forge.

universal.text: Raised by the village after zombies took my parents. I owe these people everything.
Travelled from {distant_land} seeking fortune. Your village is the first to welcome me.
